Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe its fair market value exceeds $12000. We're offering you this opportunity to own it at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in your future success. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
